pages.text: Those pesky Endermen! They always show up at night and steal blocks off the ground right from your nose. You have the feeling that the whole area here will be nothing but a single crater landscape in a month.

pages.title: Resonating Ender
pages.text: It looks like the Endermen come to this world mainly to put something down here. But what is this stuff? And why do they leave it here?$(br2)In any case, you are sure that you can definitely take advantage of this interesting material.
